Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Holiday Inn Express Warsaw Airport in Warsaw, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Sluzewiec Racetrack and Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Krolikarnia Palace and Wodny Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 124 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Warsaw? This hotel has facilities measuring 29 square feet (3 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Holiday Inn Express Warsaw Airport in Warsaw, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Sluzewiec Racetrack and Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Krolikarnia Palace and Wodny Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sluzewiec Racetrack - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Krolikarnia Palace - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Wodny Park - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Sadyba Best Mall - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Wilanow Palace - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Poster Museum - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Szczesliwice Ski Slope - 6.4 km / 4 mi
National Library of Poland - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Belweder Palace - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Frideric Chopin's Monument - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Chancellery of Prime Minster of Poland - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Warsaw University Botanical Garden - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Lazienki Palace - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Blue City Shopping Centre - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Express Warsaw Airport is Warsaw (WAW-Frederic Chopin) - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
